title: Is it normal for my Google Pixel 4a 5G to get to 100°F while charging (I dont use it while charging)
content: Im here because my Pixel temperature while charging because according to the app I use for temperature monitoring my CPU and battery get 100°F while charging or sometimes passed that and im concered because im worroed about my battery degrading over a short amount of time with suck temperatures and I use the charger that xame in the box, and I will also leave a screenshot of the app I use
